example.eg: Mike interfered when his son was playing football, and was banned from attending his games.
example.egtrans: 麦克在他儿子踢足球的时候加以干涉，被罚禁止参加儿子的比赛。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 妨碍，扰乱, 干涉，干预

example.eg: The microwave interfered with the signal.
example.egtrans: 信号受到微波炉的干扰。

example.eg: Please do not interfere with the settings on my computer, as I have them just as I want them.
example.egtrans: 我计算机上的设置都是按我想要的方式设的，请不要乱动。

example.eg: My sister is always interfering in my love life.
example.egtrans: 我姐姐总是干涉我的感情生活。

example.eg: Larry was arrested for interfering with Tom's daughter.
example.egtrans: 拉里因性骚扰汤姆的女儿而受到逮捕。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对...进行性骚扰, 性骚扰...

example.eg: The horse got tired and started interfering.
